# HELP tidb_executor_statement_total Counter of StmtNode.
# TYPE tidb_executor_statement_total counter
tidb_executor_statement_total{type="Begin"} 0
tidb_executor_statement_total{type="Commit"} 0
tidb_executor_statement_total{type="Delete"} 0
tidb_executor_statement_total{type="Insert"} 0
tidb_executor_statement_total{type="Replace"} 0
tidb_executor_statement_total{type="Rollback"} 0
tidb_executor_statement_total{type="Select"} 3
tidb_executor_statement_total{type="Show"} 0
tidb_executor_statement_total{type="Update"} 0
tidb_executor_statement_total{type="Use"} 0
